name: Dark Descent
description:
Dark Descent is a  mobile VR  roguelike dungeon crawler game submitted for the Dev Squad Jam. Darl Descent was made with Unity and Oculus technology and is built for the Samsung Gear VR and uses the GearVR Controller.

Explore a dungeon maze and encounter different monster types while you make your way to the final boss room. Multiple monster types, room encounters, and unique boss fight encounter. Built in 72 hours.
